title: Lagging with fine ping?
body: I keep on disconnecting from games, even practice bot, however my ping is fine. I can play other games wrong, I feel I tried everything help, please.

replies.body: Even with a stable ping there are still a few different things that can cause your network to lose its connection with our servers. First, make sure that the correct ports are open and try flushing your dns, but also be sure to go through the rest of the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to cover the rest of your bases.
